sentences.sContent: One day, a man named He Shi of the State of Chu got a piece of uncarved jade in a hill. He quickly went to present it to King Li of the State of Chu.
sentences.sContent_eng: One day, a man named He Shi of the State of Chu got a piece of uncarved jade in a hill. He quickly went to present it to King Li of the State of Chu.
sentences.sCn: 一天，有个叫“和氏”的楚国人，在一座山里得到一块没有雕琢过得玉石，连忙拿去献给楚厉王。
